title: We need to be able to bookmark threads
body: EG - we can keep a list of threads we can quickly access on our profile or by going to the board section the thread falls under. It'll be locally pinned for us in the latter.

replies.body: Bookmarks > new folder > boards shitposts > add threads
A lot for someone like me who has a couple hundred of bookmarks to keep track of.
